events.name: Building a Product Catalog using Elastic
events.description: Introduction Discover how Shopback is building its own Product Catalog and how Elastic plays an important role on it. This meetup will show which are the challenges Shopback is facing and how Elasticsearch, Kibana and Beats fits on this. We welcome any software engineer, data enthusiast or search fan to come over on Thursday 15th December 2016.  Presenter Profile  A lover of burgers, bubble tea, and all things tech, Alberto Resco moved to Singapore 2 years ago for love. As Engineering Manager, Alberto's challenge is to work with the Engineering Team to architect a system that can scale up to dozens of countries with a single click. Agenda • 7:00pm: Registration opens •7:10pm: Networking  • 7:30pm: Alberto Resco on Building a Product Catalog using Elastic @ ShopBack • 8:15pm: Drinks, Food & Networking
events.location: NUS Enterprise@Blk 71, 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent, #02-18, Singapore 139951

events.name: End of year Creative Coding Meetup
events.description: Mark your calendars for Thursday evening. It's about time we got together again for our favourite meetup. Time 2016. What a crazy year. Fab Cafe has kindly offered to host. Bring your projects and show us what you've been up to. More details to follow soon...
events.location: Fab Cafe @ Art Science Meseum, 6 Bayfront Ave, Singapore
